p: Spray-drying microencapsulation technology is beneficial for the protection of active compounds that are sensitive to free radical degradation, light, and oxygen [ 20, 21, 22, 23, 24, 25]. Spray-dried powders have low water activity, excellent reconstitutional characteristics, and are suitable for transportation and storage [ 26]. The main protective role of microencapsulation technology is to form a membrane/shell (wall material) around particles or droplets of active ingredients that are being encapsulated (core material) ( Figure 1) [ 14, 20].
